name: Trench Coat Tunes
description:
Created for the Ludum Dare Game Jam.

You are C.T Plaear, a fashionable music connoisseur. It is rumoured the Make Play (MP) business building is harbouring a device capable of storing ten times the amount of audio than your current cassette player.

Using your connoisseur stealth, avoid and subdue the building's guards and retrieve the hi-tech music player.
